description: Big sister of Miharu, who lives in Seiren. She is almost 30 years old and is eager to get married but lives in distress because she can`t find a man to marry. In contrast to her sister`s supernatural air headedness, Maharu is supernaturally violent. If things don`t go her way she`ll resort to brute force in order to get her way.
name: Maharu Sena Kanaka
